heading: HR01404
0: RESOLUTION URGING THE HOUSE COMMITTEE ON ENERGY TO LOOK INTO THE ORDER OF THE ENERGY REGULATORY COMMISSION FOR KEPCO SALCON POWER CORPORATION AND CENTRAL NEGROS ELECTRIC COOPERATIVE TO COLLECT FROM MEMBER-CONSUMERS PHP232 MILLION IN UNNOMINATED CONTRACT QUANTITIES STARTING OCTOBER 25, 2015
status: Pending with the Committee on ENERGY since 2017-11-21
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR01404
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION URGING THE HOUSE COMMITTEE ON ENERGY TO LOOK INTO THE ORDER OF THE ENERGY REGULATORY COMMISSION FOR KEPCO SALCON POWER CORPORATION AND CENTRAL NEGROS ELECTRIC COOPERATIVE TO COLLECT FROM MEMBER-CONSUMERS PHP232 MILLION IN UNNOMINATED CONTRACT QUANTITIES STARTING OCTOBER 25, 2015
